import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; function Volunteer() { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (

Become a Volunteer

Join our community to help resolve local issues

Coming Soon

We're currently building our volunteer platform. Soon you'll be able to sign up to help with community issues, gain recognition, and make a difference.

What volunteers do:

  • Respond to and resolve community complaints
  • Coordinate with local authorities when needed
  • Update complaint status and provide resolution details
  • Earn community recognition and rewards

Get notified when we launch:

); } export default Volunteer;
